tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE FacialRecognitionResults (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    face_image BYTEA,
    recognition_result JSONB,
    confidence_score FLOAT,
    date_time TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE face_recognition_results (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    face_id INT,
    image_path VARCHAR(255),
    result JSON,
    created_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE report_history (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    face_id INT,
    report_text TEXT,
    reporter_name VARCHAR(50),
    report_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE persons (
    person_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name TEXT,
    last_name TEXT,
    date_of_birth DATE,
    nationality TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE FaceRecognitionResults (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  image_url TEXT,
  detection_result JSON,
  created_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE Users (
  user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  username TEXT,
  full_name TEXT,
  email TEXT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE UserRoles (
  user_id INT,
  role_id INT,
  PRIMARY KEY (user_id, role_id)
)

CREATE TABLE Roles (
  role_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  role_name TEXT,
  description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE DetectedFaces (
    face_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    image_id INT,
    face_image bytea,
    face_encoding TEXT,
    confidence FLOAT
);
